introduction: Today, you'll learn English vocabulary scenes from popular movies and series, with the RealLife Engl

vocabulary.definition: expressing the same idea using different words
vocabulary.example: She was skilled at paraphrasing complex information into simpler terms.
He had difficulty recollecting the details of the event.
The superhero faced his arch-nemesis, a powerful foe.

vocabulary.definition: complete or unbroken; not damaged or impaired
vocabulary.example: Despite the accident, the ancient artifact remained intact.

vocabulary.definition: acting or done without forethought; spontaneous
vocabulary.example: His impulsive decision to quit his job surprised everyone.

vocabulary.definition: to act as a friend to someone; to become friends with
vocabulary.example: The new student hoped to befriend classmates in the upcoming school year.
